languages.text: Ветви домов Версериан и Гапрак ненадолго переплелись в брачном союзе Астарции и Вицента. К большому горю супружеской четы и на потеху злорадной знати Даргонуса их брак так и не дал потомства. Как и ее предки, Астарция Версериан-Гапрак посвятила жизнь службе. Раздавленный событиями, пошатнувшими стабильность в его роду, а также невозможностью оставить наследника, Вицент жил в тени супруги. Со временем он ушел из жизни, так никем и не замеченный.

Branches of Houses Gaprak and Werserian became intertwined for a time after the marriage of Astartia and Vicent. To the great sadness of the couple and the great amusement of the spiteful Dargonus nobility, their marriage produced no children. Just like her ancestors, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak dedicated her life to service. Crushed by the events that shook the stability of his house and his inability to provide an heir, Vicent lived in his wife's shadow. When his time came, he passed away without notice.
languages.original_text: Ветви домов Версериан и Гапрак ненадолго переплелись в брачном союзе Астарции и Вицента. К большому горю супружеской четы и на потеху злорадной знати Даргонуса их брак так и не дал потомства. Как и ее предки, Астарция Версериан-Гапрак посвятила жизнь службе. Раздавленный событиями, пошатнувшими стабильность в его роду, а также невозможностью оставить наследника, Вицент жил в тени супруги. Со временем он ушел из жизни, так никем и не замеченный.

traits.locale_text: Branches of the houses of Gaprak and Werserian for a short time intertwined in a marriage of Astartia and Vicent. To the great sadness of the couple and the great amusement of spiteful Dargonus nobility, in their marriage they had no children. Just like her ancestors, Astartia Werserian-Garpak dedicated her life to the service. Crushed by the events that shook the stability of his house, and his inability to leave an heir, Vicent lived in the shadow of his wife. When the time came, he passed away unnoticed by everyone.

Crushed by the events that shook the stability of his house, and his inability to leave an heir, Vicent lived in the shadow of his wife. When the time came, he passed away unnoticed by everyone.

Just like her ancestors, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak dedicated her life to service. languages.text: 艾丝塔西娅与文森特步入了婚姻的殿堂，贾帕克家族也和韦尔森家族短暂交织在了一起。然而，他们的结合却没能留下子嗣，这让这对伴侣悲伤不已，而达戈努斯敌对贵族对此幸灾乐祸。艾丝塔西娅·韦尔森·贾帕克和她的先人一样，将她的一生用来侍奉行商浪人的王朝。而文森特，由于家族动荡与无法生育的问题，余生都活在妻子的阴影下。最终，他悄无声息地离世了。
languages.original_text: Branches of Houses Gaprak and Werserian became intertwined for a time after the marriage of Astartia and Vicent. To the great sadness of the couple and the great amusement of the spiteful Dargonus nobility, their marriage produced no children. Just like her ancestors, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak dedicated her life to service. Crushed by the events that shook the stability of his house and his inability to provide an heir, Vicent lived in his wife's shadow. When his time came, he passed away without notice.

traits.locale_text: 艾丝塔西娅与文森特步入了婚姻的殿堂，贾帕克家族也和韦尔森家族短暂交织在了一起。然而，他们的结合却没能留下子嗣，这让这对伴侣悲伤不已，而达戈努斯敌对贵族对此幸灾乐祸。艾丝塔西娅·韦尔森·贾帕克和她的先人一样，将她的一生用来侍奉行商浪人的王朝。而文森特，由于家族动荡与无法生育的问题，余生都活在妻子的阴影下。最终，他悄无声息地离世了。

languages.text: Nach der Heirat zwischen Astartia und Vicent entstanden für eine Zeit lang Verflechtungen zwischen den Häusern Gaprak und Werserian. Zum großen Bedauern des Paares und zur großen Belustigung des gehässigen Adels von Dargonus gingen aus der Ehe keine Kinder hervor. Genau wie ihre Vorfahren widmete Astartia Werserian-Gaprak ihr Leben dem Dienst. Am Boden zerstört von den Ereignissen, welche die Stabilität seines Hauses ins Wanken gebracht hatten, und von seiner Unfähigkeit, einen Erben zu zeugen, lebte Vicent im Schatten seiner Gemahlin. Als seine Zeit gekommen war, verstarb er unbemerkt.
languages.original_text: Branches of Houses Gaprak and Werserian became intertwined for a time after the marriage of Astartia and Vicent. To the great sadness of the couple and the great amusement of the spiteful Dargonus nobility, their marriage produced no children. Just like her ancestors, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak dedicated her life to service. Crushed by the events that shook the stability of his house and his inability to provide an heir, Vicent lived in his wife's shadow. When his time came, he passed away without notice.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Heirat zwischen Astartia und Vicent entstanden für eine Zeit lang Verflechtungen zwischen den Häusern Gaprak und Werserian. Zum großen Bedauern des Paares und zur großen Belustigung des gehässigen Adels von Dargonus gingen aus der Ehe keine Kinder hervor. Genau wie ihre Vorfahren widmete Astartia Werserian-Gaprak ihr Leben dem Dienst. Am Boden zerstört von den Ereignissen, welche die Stabilität seines Hauses ins Wanken gebracht hatten, und von seiner Unfähigkeit, einen Erben zu zeugen, lebte Vicent im Schatten seiner Gemahlin. Als die Zeit kam, verstarb er unbemerkt.

languages.text: Deux branches des maisons Gaprak et Werserian joignirent pendant un temps leurs destinées après le mariage d'Astartia et Vicent. Au grand désespoir du couple, aucun enfant ne naquit de leur union, ce qui réjouit considérablement la noblesse méprisante de Dargonus. Tout comme ses ancêtres avant elle, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak fit le choix de consacrer sa vie au service du protectorat. Vicent vécut quant à lui dans l'ombre de sa femme, anéanti par les événements qui déstabilisèrent sa maison et par son incapacité à lui donner un héritier, puis mourut dans l'obscurité lorsque son heure fut venue.
languages.original_text: Branches of Houses Gaprak and Werserian became intertwined for a time after the marriage of Astartia and Vicent. To the great sadness of the couple and the great amusement of the spiteful Dargonus nobility, their marriage produced no children. Just like her ancestors, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak dedicated her life to service. Crushed by the events that shook the stability of his house and his inability to provide an heir, Vicent lived in his wife's shadow. When his time came, he passed away without notice.

traits.locale_text: Deux branches des maisons Gaprak et Werserian joignirent pendant un temps leurs destinées après le mariage d'Astartia et Vicent. Au grand désespoir du couple, aucun enfant ne naquit de leur union, ce qui réjouit considérablement la noblesse méprisante de Dargonus. Tout comme ses ancêtres avant elle, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak fit le choix de consacrer sa vie au service du protectorat. Vicent vécut quant à lui dans l'ombre de sa femme, anéanti par les événements qui déstabilisèrent sa maison et par son incapacité à lui donner un héritier, puis mourut dans l’obscurité lorsque son heure fut venue.

languages.text: Las ramas de las casas Gaprak y Werserian se entrelazaron temporalmente con el matrimonio entre Astartia y Vicent. Para desgracia de la pareja y disfrute de la nobleza rencorosa de Dargonus, la unión no resultó en descendientes. Al igual que sus ancestros, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak dedicó su vida al servicio. Destrozado por los eventos que desestabilizaron a su casa y por su incapacidad de engendrar un heredero, Vicent vivió a la sombra de su esposa. Cuando llegó su hora, murió sin pena ni gloria.
languages.original_text: Branches of Houses Gaprak and Werserian became intertwined for a time after the marriage of Astartia and Vicent. To the great sadness of the couple and the great amusement of the spiteful Dargonus nobility, their marriage produced no children. Just like her ancestors, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak dedicated her life to service. Crushed by the events that shook the stability of his house and his inability to provide an heir, Vicent lived in his wife's shadow. When his time came, he passed away without notice.

traits.locale_text: Las ramas de las casas Gaprak y Werserian se entrelazaron temporalmente con el matrimonio entre Astartia y Vicent. Para desgracia de la pareja y disfrute de la nobleza rencorosa de Dargonus, la unión no resultó en descendientes. Al igual que sus ancestros, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak dedicó su vida al servicio. Destrozado por los eventos que desestabilizaron a su casa y por su incapacidad de engendrar un heredero, Vicent vivió a la sombra de su esposa. Cuando llegó su hora, murió sin pena ni gloria.

languages.text: ギャプラック家とウェルザリアン家は、アスタルチアとヴィセントの結婚によってしばらくの間、家系を交わらせることとなった。ふたりが悲嘆に暮れ、同時にダルゴナスの陰険な貴族を大いに喜ばせたのは、夫妻が子宝に恵まれなかったことだ。アスタルチア・ウェルザリアン=ギャプラックは父祖と同じように、その生涯を奉仕にささげた。一家の安定を揺るがした出来事と後継者を持てぬことに打ちひしがれたヴィセントは、妻の影に隠れて生きていた。そしてその時が来たとき、彼は誰にも何も伝えずこの世を去った。
languages.original_text: Branches of Houses Gaprak and Werserian became intertwined for a time after the marriage of Astartia and Vicent. To the great sadness of the couple and the great amusement of the spiteful Dargonus nobility, their marriage produced no children. Just like her ancestors, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak dedicated her life to service. Crushed by the events that shook the stability of his house and his inability to provide an heir, Vicent lived in his wife's shadow. When his time came, he passed away without notice.

traits.locale_text: ギャプラック家とウェルザリアン家は、アスタルチアとヴィセントの結婚によってしばらくの間、家系を交わらせることとなった。ふたりが悲嘆に暮れ、同時にダルゴナスの陰険な貴族を大いに喜ばせたのは、夫妻が子宝に恵まれなかったことだ。アスタルチア・ウェルザリアン=ギャプラックは父祖と同じように、その生涯を奉仕にささげた。一家の安定を揺るがした出来事と後継者を持てぬことに打ちひしがれたヴィセントは、妻の影に隠れて生きていた。そしてその時が来たとき、彼は誰にも何も伝えずこの世を去った。

languages.text: Astartia ve Vicent'ın evliliğinin ardından Gaprak ve Werserian Haneleri, bir süreliğine iş birliği içinde hareket etti. Çiftin bu evlilikten çocuklarının olmaması, ikilide üzüntü yaratırken kindar Dargonus soylularını sevince boğdu. Astartia Werserian-Gaprak, tıpkı ataları gibi hayatını hizmete adadı. Hanesinin istikrarını sarsan olayların ve bir vâris veremediği gerçeğinin altında ezilen Vicent, karısının gölgesinde yaşadı. Vadesi dolduğunda da sessiz sakin göçüp gitti.
languages.original_text: Branches of Houses Gaprak and Werserian became intertwined for a time after the marriage of Astartia and Vicent. To the great sadness of the couple and the great amusement of the spiteful Dargonus nobility, their marriage produced no children. Just like her ancestors, Astartia Werserian-Gaprak dedicated her life to service. Crushed by the events that shook the stability of his house and his inability to provide an heir, Vicent lived in his wife's shadow. When his time came, he passed away without notice.

traits.locale_text: Astartia ve Vicent'ın evliliğinin ardından Gaprak ve Werserian Haneleri bir süreliğine iş birliği içinde hareket etti. Çiftte üzüntü, kindar Dargonus soylularında mutluluk yaratan bir şekilde çiftin bu evlilikten çocukları olmadı. Astartia Werserian-Gaprak tıpkı ataları gibi hayatını hizmete adadı. Hanesinin istikrarını sarsan olayların ve bir vâris veremediği gerçeğinin altında ezilen Vicent, karısının gölgesinde yaşadı. Vadesi dolduğunda da kimseye fark ettirmeden vefat etti.
